title: Sparse Nullstellensatz, resultants and determinants of complexes
abstract:
We refine and extend a result by Tuitman on the supports of a B\'ezout
identity satisfied by a finite sequence of sparse Laurent polynomials without
common zeroes in the toric variety associated to their supports. When the
number of these polynomials is one more than the dimension of the ambient
space, we obtain a formula for computing the sparse resultant as the
determinant of a Koszul type complex.
